alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 17 at 2:14AM MST until June 17 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE....The area including the cities of Jacob Lake, Fredonia, Grand Canyon Village, Supai, North Rim, and Valle. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau
